Name: Notebook Ninja Fights
About the game: The ninja doodles you used to draw in your notebook in Science class turned into life! In Notebook Ninja Fights you will... fight to death against 4 terrible bosses throw shurikens in the 40 levels the game offers become the ultimate ninja fighter from your dreams as a kid do amazing ninja attacks that you drew as doodles in school save your teen crush from the evil dracula!
